definition: A highly contagious and potentially severe respiratory illness caused by a specific type of virus, often associated with global outbreaks and pandemics. It is commonly referred to when discussing public health, epidemiology, and the impact on society.

examples.german: Das Coronavirus breitet sich weltweit aus.
Die Zahl der Coronavirus-Infektionen steigt stetig an.
examples.english: The number of coronavirus infections is steadily increasing.

examples.german: Das Coronavirus hat zu vielen Todesfällen geführt.
examples.english: The coronavirus has led to many deaths.

examples.german: Die Regierung hat Maßnahmen ergriffen, um das Coronavirus einzudämmen.
examples.english: The government has taken measures to contain the coronavirus.

examples.german: Es gibt derzeit keinen Impfstoff gegen das Coronavirus.
examples.english: There is currently no vaccine against the coronavirus.
